topics.body: When you think about it, most of the world's scientific and technological pioneers were men. Issac Newton, Charles Darwin, Bill Gates, Aristotle, Albert Einstein, Archimedes, Galileo, James Watson, Steve Jobs, Carl Linnaeus, to name but a few. The only women I can think of that influenced science so much like those men did were Mary Curie and Mary Anning, and maybe a few others.
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53eb09af63687252eba40000#post_53eb09af63687252eba40000
I am not saying that women can't be good scientists, and I am not a sexist. I am all for gender equality. But feminists need to stop implying that women are somehow special.

Quick time to roll the threadjack dice.
Potential threadjacks)monstergirls, rwby, no not the memes anything but the memes!  They're in my eyes! *screaming*, touhou, traps, science, shit going on in the world, video games.
*rolls dice*
Monster girls
